text: Marcelo Castelo Veiga (7 October 1964 – 14 December 2020), commonly known as Marcelo Veiga, was a Brazilian professional football manager and player. He played for Santos, Internacional, Goiás, Bahia and Portuguesa. He managed Bragantino. He was born in São Paulo, Brazil. Veiga died on 14 December 2020, aged 56 in Bragança Paulista, from COVID-19. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brazil Category:Footballers from São Paulo Category:Brazilian football managers
title: Marcelo Veiga
